statements: SELECT * FROM volunteer_registration;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteer_registration;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_phone, volunteer_address FROM volunteer_registration;
SELECT volunteer_name FROM volunteer_registration WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_registration WHERE volunteer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteer_registration WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_registration WHERE volunteer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_phone FROM volunteer_registration WHERE volunteer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_email, volunteer_phone FROM volunteer_registration WHERE volunteer_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_address FROM volunteer_registration WHERE volunteer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM VolunteerRegistration;
SELECT name, email FROM VolunteerRegistration WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT volunteer_id, phone_number FROM VolunteerRegistration ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT task_description FROM Assignment WHERE assignment_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM VolunteerRegistration INNER JOIN Assignment ON VolunteerRegistration.volunteer_id = Assignment.volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerRegistration ORDER BY registration_date DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM VolunteerRegistration WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT assignment_id, task_description, assignment_date FROM Assignment WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT v.name, a.task_description FROM VolunteerRegistration v JOIN Assignment a ON v.volunteer_id = a.volunteer_id WHERE v.phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_assignments, MONTH(assignment_date) as month FROM Assignment GROUP BY MONTH(assignment_date) ORDER BY total_assignments DESC, month ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_phone FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 2;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_email, task_id FROM volunteers INNER JOIN assignments ON volunteers.volunteer_id = assignments.volunteer_id;
SELECT task_description, task_due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';

SELECT volunteers.volunteer_id, volunteers.volunteer_name, tasks.task_description FROM volunteers, tasks, assignments WHERE volunteers.volunteer_id = assignments.volunteer_id AND tasks.task_id = assignments.task_id;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, date, location FROM Events WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, volunteer_id, event_id, assignment_date FROM Assignments WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE event_id = 3 AND assignment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, description FROM Events WHERE DATE > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, volunteer_id, event_id, assignment_date FROM Assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, task_name FROM Events INNER JOIN Tasks ON Events.event_id = Tasks.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM Programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_id, skill_name FROM VolunteerSkills INNER JOIN Skills ON VolunteerSkills.skill_id = Skills.skill_id;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT v.first_name, v.last_name, p.program_name FROM Volunteers v JOIN Assignments a ON v.volunteer_id = a.volunteer_id JOIN Programs p ON a.program_id = p.program_id;
SELECT DISTINCT v.first_name, v.last_name, s.skill_name FROM Volunteers v JOIN VolunteerSkills vs ON v.volunteer_id = vs.volunteer_id JOIN Skills s ON vs.skill_id = s.skill_id;

SELECT v.first_name, v.last_name, p.program_name, a.assignment_date FROM Volunteers v JOIN Assignments a ON v.volunteer_id = a.volunteer_id JOIN Programs p ON a.program_id = p.program_id WHERE a.assignment_date > '2022-01-01';
